data.message: I wish you wouldn't have asked me to choose between you and my President last night. You were like a hero to us young reckless white kids growing up in suburban Michigan. Not sure what happened to you or why you are doing this but consider me no longer a fan. It really is sad because every part of my life has an Eminem song in it somewhere. You probably won't read this and could care less about losing 1 fan, but I can't listen to your liberal elite propaganda anymore.

replies.message: You made the wrong choice my friend I am sorry.
"liberal propaganda" lol. Are you deaf? Have you not heard a single word that shitstain trump has said? Keep on being a sheep.

Well said Joel - too many dumb people in this country to even understand the issues that we are faced with - but does not stop them from commenting on them!  SMH!  I hated hearing him go there as well.
Josh Haibon nope. The right choice
